pages.title: Universal Materials
pages.text: These materials grant effects that work on both tools and weapons, making them incredibly versatile!

pages.title: Gold Ingot
pages.text: $(bold)Effect:$() XP Boost (Experience Boost) +2$(br)$(bold)Color:$() Gold$(br)$(bold)Best For:$() Everything!$(br2)Doubles your XP gain from all sources!

pages.title: Ghast Tear
pages.text: $(bold)Effect:$() Mending (Self-Repair) +2$(br)$(bold)Color:$() White$(br)$(bold)Best For:$() Valuable items$(br2)Repairs your item using XP orbs!

pages.title: Netherite Ingot
pages.text: $(bold)Effects:$() Unbreaking (Durability) +5, Mining Speed +2, Sharpness +2$(br)$(bold)Color:$() Dark Gray$(br)$(bold)Best For:$() Everything!$(br2)$(important)Triple effect!$() The ultimate material!

pages.title: Ender Pearl
pages.text: $(bold)Effect:$() Extended Reach +2$(br)$(bold)Color:$() Teal$(br)$(bold)Best For:$() All items$(br2)Increases your block/entity interaction range by 2 blocks!

pages.title: Spore Blossom
pages.text: $(bold)Effect:$() Biome Resonance +1$(br)$(bold)Color:$() Pink$(br)$(bold)Best For:$() All items$(br2)Grants bonuses based on the biome you're in! Adapts to your environment.

pages.title: Phantom Membrane
pages.text: $(bold)Effect:$() Moon Phase Sensitivity +1$(br)$(bold)Color:$() Light Blue$(br)$(bold)Best For:$() All items$(br2)Power waxes and wanes with the phases of the moon!

pages.title: Lightning Rod
pages.text: $(bold)Effect:$() Weather Siphon +1$(br)$(bold)Color:$() Copper$(br)$(bold)Best For:$() All items$(br2)Draws power from weather conditions - rain, thunder, and storms!
